DOC.brief_summary: The investigator conduct randomize double blind study , determine whether patient analgesic delivery mode preference affect pain reduction quality non-surgical spine patient . The patient receive intra-muscular oral non-narcotic analgesic placebo . During study period , pain reduction parameter collect . At end study period , investigator attempt find correlation pre-study patient preference quality pain reduction achieve .
DOC.brief_title: Patient Preferences , Analgesic Delivery Method Pain Reduction Spine Patients
DOC.criteria: Patients chronic acute back pain Recent Spine Surgery
